The Human Rights Council resolution calls upon the Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights to undertake a comprehensive investigation into alleged serious violations and abuses of human rights and related crimes as well as to monitor the human rights situation in Sri Lanka and to continue to assess progress on relevant national processes .
It calls upon the high commissioner to provide an oral update on its findings during the 27th session of the council in September 2014 , and a thorough report during the 28th session in March 2015 .
